typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Original Size} as string,
		{Corrected Size} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Original_Size as string,
		Corrected_Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select Original_Size as lkp_Original_Size, Corrected_Size as lkp_Corrected_Size from \ndbo.speed_rating_SCD',
	format: 'query') ~> sizetable
source1, sizetable lookup({Original Size} == Original_Size,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
